tool_description: Retrieves a random image from a public Vrty.org profile
name: vrty
title: vrty

api_list.name: /user/{user-id}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://toto-vrty-v1.p.rapidapi.com/user/toto-castaldi"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "toto-vrty-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://toto-vrty-v1.p.rapidapi.com/user/{user_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "toto-vrty-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
